All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCompilersProvider
Base for defining a compiler-supplying arguments provider for Junit Jupiter parameterised test support.
AbstractContainerGroupAssert<I extends AbstractContainerGroupAssert<I,C>,C extends ContainerGroup>
Base assertions that can be performed on a container group.
AbstractEnumAssert<S extends AbstractEnumAssert<S,E>,E extends Enum<E>>
Abstract base class for an assertion on an Enum.
AbstractJavaFileObjectAssert<S extends AbstractJavaFileObjectAssert<S,A>,A extends JavaFileObject>
Abstract assertions for Java file objects.
AbstractJctCompiler<A extends AbstractJctCompiler<A>>
Common functionality for a compiler that can be overridden and that produces a JctCompilationImpl as the compilation result.
AbstractPackageContainerGroup
An abstract base implementation for a group of containers that relate to a specific location.
AbstractTestDirectory<I extends AbstractTestDirectory<I>>
Abstract base for implementing a reusable managed wrapper around a directory of some sort.
AnnotationProcessorDiscovery
Mode for annotation processor discovery when no explicit processors are provided.
BasicPathWrapperImpl
A wrapper around an existing Java NIO Path that makes it compatible with the PathWrapper API.
CheckReturnValue
A hint for IDEs like IntelliJ that will produce a warning if the user does not use the return value of the annotated method.
ClassLoaderAssert
Assertions to perform on a classloader.
CompilationAssert
Assertions that apply to a JctCompilation.
Container
Container that wraps a file path source of some description.
ContainerGroup
Base container group interface.
ContainerGroupUrlClassLoader
An extension of the Java URLClassLoader that wraps around container groups.
DiagnosticAssert
Assertions for an individual trace diagnostic.
DiagnosticKindAssert
Assertions for an individual diagnostic kind.
DiagnosticListAssert
Assertions for a list of diagnostics.
DiagnosticListRepresentation
Representation of a collection of diagnostics.
DiagnosticRepresentation
Representation of a diagnostic.
FileManagerBuilder
A template for creating a file manager later.
FileUtils
Utilities for handling files in the file system.
GarbageDisposalUtils
Common global hook for intercepting garbage collection events.
IoExceptionUtils
Utilities for handling IOExceptions and converting them to UncheckedIOExceptions.
IoExceptionUtils.IoRunnable
A runnable interface that may throw an IOException.
IoExceptionUtils.IoSupplier<T>
A supplier interface that may throw an IOException.
IterableUtils
Iterable and collection helper utilities.
JarContainerImpl
Container that wraps a JAR path and allows reading the contents of the JAR in-memory lazily.
JavacCompilerTest
Annotation that can be applied to a ParameterizedTest to enable passing in a range of JavacJctCompilerImpl instances with specific configured versions as the first parameter.
JavacCompilerTest.JavacCompilersProvider
Argument provider for the JavacCompilerTest annotation.
JavacJctCompilerImpl
Implementation of a javac compiler.
JavacJctFlagBuilderImpl
Helper to build flags for a standard Javac implementation for the OpenJDK.
JavaFileObjectAssert
Assertions for Java file objects.
JavaFileObjectKindAssert
Assertions for an individual Java file object kind.
JctAssertions
Helper class to provide fluent creation of assertions for compilations.
JctCompilation
Interface representing the result of a compilation.
JctCompilationFactory<A extends JctCompiler<A,JctCompilationImpl>>
Helper for performing a compilation using a given compiler.
JctCompilationFactory.CompilationResult
Outcome of a compilation pass.
JctCompilationImpl
Representation of the result of running a Javac compilation.
JctCompilationImpl.Builder
Builder type for a JctCompilationImpl to simplify initialization.
JctCompiler<C extends JctCompiler<C,R>,R extends JctCompilation>
Base definition of a compiler that can be configured to perform a compilation run against sources.
JctCompilerConfigurer<T extends Exception>
Function representing a configuration operation that can be applied to a compiler.
JctCompilerConfigurer.JctSimpleCompilerConfigurer
A compiler configurer interface that has no type parameters and cannot throw checked exceptions.
JctCompilerException
Exception that is thrown if the compiler fails to run and throws an unhandled exception.
JctException
Base for any exceptions thrown by JCT.
JctFileManager
Extension around a JavaFileManager that allows adding of PathWrapper objects to the manager.
JctFileManagerImpl
Simple implementation of a JctFileManager.
JctFlagBuilder
Interface for defining a common flag builder for compilers.
JctJunitConfigurerException
An exception that is thrown when a compiler configurer cannot be initialised successfully using the JCT JUnit parameterised test API.
Lazy<T>
Helper type that wraps an initializer and invokes it lazily as required.
Lazy.ThrowingConsumer<T,E extends Throwable>
Consumer that throws some form of checked exception if something goes wrong.
LocationAssert
Assertions for an individual location.
LocationRepresentation
Representation for a location.
LoggingFileManagerProxy
A proxy that wraps a JctFileManager in a proxy that can log all interactions with the JavaFileManager, along with a corresponding stacktrace.
LoggingMode
Options for how to handle logging on special internal components.
ModuleContainerGroup
A container group implementation that holds zero or more modules.
ModuleContainerGroupAssert
Assertions for module container groups.
ModuleContainerGroupImpl
Simple implementation of a ModuleContainerGroup.
ModuleHandle
Helper class that extracts a module name from a string as a prefix and holds the result.
ModuleLocation
Handle that represents the location of a module.
NonNullApi
Marker annotation for a package.
NonNullImpl
Marker annotation for a package.
Nullable
Annotation for documentation purposes indicating that the annotated element may have a null value.
OutputContainerGroup
A base definition for an output-oriented container group.
OutputContainerGroupAssert
Assertions for output container groups.
OutputContainerGroupImpl
A group of containers that relate to a specific output location.
PackageContainerGroup
Interface describing a group of containers.
PackageContainerGroupAssert
Assertions for package container groups.
PackageContainerGroupImpl
A group of containers that relate to a specific location.
PathFileObject
A very simple JavaFileObject that points to a path on some FileSystem somewhere.
PathFileObjectAssert
Assertions for Path file objects.
PathWrapper
A path-like object that can provide a Java NIO Path.
PathWrapperUtils
Common helper methods for dealing with path wrappers.
PathWrappingContainerImpl
A container that wraps a known directory of files.
RamDirectory
A wrapper around a temporary in-memory file system that exposes the root path of said file system.
RecursiveDeleter
Helper file visitor that will recursively delete files.
SpecialLocationUtils
Helper methods that expose special JVM locations.
StackTraceAssert
Assertions for a list of stack trace frames.
StackTraceElementAssert
Assertions to perform on a stack trace frame.
StackTraceRepresentation
Representation of a list of stack trace frames.
StringSlicer
Utility to efficiently split strings using a delimiter without using regular expressions.
StringUtils
Utilities for string manipulation used internally in this library.
TeeWriter
A writer that wraps an output stream and also writes any content to an in-memory buffer.
TempDirectory
Temporary file system location that can be created by users to store sources, inputs, and outputs for compilation within.
TestDirectoryFactory
Functional interface representing a factory that can create temporary directories for testing.
ToStringBuilder
Builder of Object.toString() representations for POJO objects.
TraceDiagnostic<S extends JavaFileObject>
A wrapper around a Diagnostic which contains additional information about where the diagnostic was reported.
TracingDiagnosticListener<S extends JavaFileObject>
A diagnostics listener that wraps all diagnostics in additional invocation information, and then stores them in a queue for processing later.
WillClose
Marker annotation indicating that the given parameter will be automatically closed by the resource after it is finished with.
WillCloseWhenClosed
Marker annotation indicating that the given parameter will be automatically closed by the resource it is being passed to when the outer resource is closed.
WillNotClose
Marker indicating the return value of a method must be closed explicitly.
